name: Engine Fire During Startup
description: Engine fire occurs during startup procedure

phases.name: Engine Starts
phases.description: Engine successfully starts despite the fire

name: Engine Failure In Flight
description: Engine suddenly fails during flight

name: Engine Failure During Takeoff Roll
description: Engine fails during takeoff roll

name: Engine Failure Immediately After Liftoff
description: Engine fails just after liftoff, with room to land on the runway

name: Power-Off Stall
description: Demonstrate recognition and recovery from power-off stall

name: Power-On Stall
description: Demonstrate recognition and recovery from power-on stall

name: Engine Fire in Flight
description: Engine fire during flight

name: Electrical Fire
description: Electrical system fire

name: Short Field Takeoff
description: Maximum performance takeoff from a short field

name: Short Field Landing
description: Approach and landing on a short field

name: Soft Field Takeoff
description: Takeoff from a soft or rough field

name: Soft Field Landing
description: Landing on a soft or rough field

name: Emergency Descent
description: Rapid descent to a lower altitude

name: Steep Turns
description: 45-degree banked turns maintaining altitude

name: Slow Flight
description: Flight at minimum controllable airspeed

name: Radio Communication Failure
description: Loss of radio communication capability

name: Forced Landing
description: Forced landing due to engine failure

name: Go-Around
description: Abort landing and return to traffic pattern

name: Chandelles
description: Maximum performance climbing turn

name: Lazy Eights
description: Series of climbing and descending turns

name: Steep Spirals
description: Steep descending turns around a point

name: Steep Turns
description: 50-degree banked turns maintaining altitude

name: Accelerated Stall
description: Recognition and recovery from stall during a turn at a higher airspeed

name: Eights on Pylons
description: Maintain visual reference to two ground points while maneuvering

name: Icing During Flight
description: Encountering and managing airframe icing conditions

name: Static Port Icing
description: Managing blocked static port conditions

name: Wing Fire
description: Fire involving the wing structure (not wing-mounted engine)
